item.title: Dealing with nested data
item.description: Dealing with nested data can be really frustrating… Especially if you want to keep your workspace nice and tidy with all your data in tables! With no actual experience trying to get at these nested tibbles can seem almost impossible: via GIPHY -- Downloading data from an api created by Blizzard To illustrate how you would deal with nested data I found an api that let’s you download all kinds of data on the e-sport/game called Overwatch.
